interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ECBASKET 500 PCS Stiletto False Nails Short Acrylic Nail Tips 10 sizes Full Coverage Fake Nails (100PCS Nail Forms)
Review Date: 2018/06/02
Store: ECBASKET
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Size': 'Small', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ECBASKET', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 3.25 x 0.75 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '701392295127'}
Review Text: A decent product for a decent price.  These are nice and flexible, making removal super easy.  They can be reused, once you clean them and sanitize them with rubbing alcohol.  These are more square at the cuticle area, great for those with a more square shaped nail bed, my thumbs are pretty square.  They come in 10 sizes (10 of each size) and the sizes are reasonable sizing too.  I have dual forms from another brand and half of them are unreasonably HUGE, whereas these are for normal people.  For my thumb I used size 2 and my other fingers fit 4-8.  They came in a plastic organizer case that is way smaller than my other case, so they don't take up a ton of room in my nail station.  The latch on mine didn't close tight, so I had to use a piece of tape, but I'm not taking off any stars because that didn't affect the usefulness of the product itself.  All in all, the C curve was perfect, easy to load, cure and pinch off.  I found these to be perfect for anyone who wants a square cuticle line, rather than a round one. I purchased this thru my Amazon Prime account and did not receive any compensation for this completely unbiased review.
Review Title: I found these to be perfect for anyone who wants a square cuticle line, rather than a round one.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Nail Aesthetics:** Prefers acrylic nail solutions, specifically those that offer flexibility and ease of removal. Shows a preference for square cuticle shapes over round ones.
  
- **Product Size Consideration:** Values a variety of size options, favoring products that accommodate different nail beds, indicating attention to personal fit and comfort.

- **Review Style:** Provides detailed and practical feedback, focusing on features like usability and value for money. Exhibits a balanced perspective, addressing minor flaws without detracting from overall satisfaction.

- **Organization and Space Efficiency:** Prefers products that come with a compact storage solution, indicating a tendency towards organized and efficient spaces in their nail care routine.

- **Purchase Behavior:** Engages with platforms like Amazon Prime for purchasing, suggesting a familiarity with online shopping and a preference for convenience.

- **General Sentiment:** Expresses positive experiences with products that meet practical needs while also emphasizing aesthetic preferences and functional design. 

Overall, the user demonstrates a keen interest in practical nail care products that offer personal comfort and aesthetic appeal, along with organized storage solutions.
